00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;

00028 /*
00029  * Initialize the class.
00030  */
00031 TextFileWriter::TextFileWriter()
00032 {
00033 }

00035 /*
00036  * Clean up.
00037  */
00038 TextFileWriter::~TextFileWriter()
00039 {

00042 /*
00043  * Write the entire file, the header and body.
00044  */
00045 void TextFileWriter::WriteFile(const std::string &fileName, std::map<std::string, std::string> &textData)
00046 {
00047         OpenFile(fileName);
00048         WriteFileBody(textData);
00049         CloseFile();
00050 }
00051 
00052 /*
00053  * Open the file stream.
00054  */
00055 void TextFileWriter::OpenFile(const std::string &fileName)
00056 {
00057   Fs::aptOpen(fileStream, fileName, std::ios::out);
00058   if (!fileStream.is_open() && !fileStream.good())
00059         {
00060                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileCreateException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00061                 throw e;
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 /*
00066  * Closes the file stream.
00067  */
00068 void TextFileWriter::CloseFile()
00069 {
00070         fileStream.close();
00071         if (fileStream.fail())
00072         {
00073                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileWriteException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00074                 throw e;
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00078 /*
00079  * The fhe parameters to the file in the format name=value.
00080  */
00081 void TextFileWriter::WriteFileBody(std::map<std::string, std::string> &textData)
00082 {
00083         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator it;
00084         for (it=textData.begin(); it!=textData.end(); it++)
00085         {
00086                 fileStream << (*it).first << "=" << (*it).second << std::endl;
00087         }
00088 }
